hero.title: Empowering Youth Through Combat Sports
hero.subtitle: Providing access, mentorship, and opportunity to at-risk youth.

sections.title: Our Mission
sections.body: SOSF connects kids with local gyms and mentors to build confidence, discipline, and purpose through combat sports.

sections.title: Get Involved
sections.body: Join as a volunteer, mentor, or sponsor gym.

sections.title: Donate
sections.body: Your contributions go directly to training scholarships and mentorship programs.
